article.class: et_pb_post clearfix et_pb_no_thumb et_pb_blog_item_0_4 post-167619 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-announcements category-featured category-from-the-principals-desk
article.p: Mar 9, 2020 | Announcements, Featured, From the Principal's Desk

div.p: Dear Parent/s or Guardian, With the Coronavirus (COVID-19) in the U.S. and in our state, Eminence Elementary and Jr.-Sr. High School is working to prevent it from affecting our students and staff. Our families are the most important factor in keeping us healthy in...

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix et_pb_blog_item_0_5 post-167561 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-featured category-from-the-principals-desk category-guidance category-prek-12
article.p: Jan 31, 2020 | Featured, From the Principal's Desk, Guidance, PreK-12

div.p: On Tuesday, January 28th members of the Eminence Sunshine Society went to the Morgan County Boys and Girls Club to give of their time and efforts to make our community better. Boys and Girls Club Director, Chris Tann, appreciated the help and put them to work SPRING...
